title: 83/109/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 March 1983 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (Region of Calabria) pursuant to Title II of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 March 1983
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (Region of Calabria) pursuant to Title II of Council Directive 75/268/EEC
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(83/109/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The regulation of the region of Calabria of 24 January 1982 fixing the compensatory allowances for mountain and hill farming areas and farming in certain less-favoured areas satisfies the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures as referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
